lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Peruvian central bank president Leonel Figueroa and the head of Bank of Mexico, Miguel Mancera Aguayo, met in Mexico City yesterday to coordinate actions aimed at consolidating the upward trend in the price of silver, the official newspaper El Peruano said today.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Huayta said his Mexican counterpart, minister of oil, mines and parastatal industry, Alfredo del Mazo, should be in Lima on a visit at a nearby date.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Energy and mines minister, Wilfredo Huayta, said Peru would maintain its freeze on new sales of silver until the price of the precious metal reaches "the true value this raw material should have."
